content.data:
# SIMPLE GRANT AGREEMENT

**BETWEEN GRANTOR:**

<u>${variables.grantorName}</u> ("Grantor")

<u>${variables.grantorEthAddress}</u> ("Grantor Address")

**AND RECIPIENT:**

<u>${variables.recipientName}</u> ("Recipient")

<u>${variables.recipientEthAddress}</u> ("Recipient Address")

**EFFECTIVE DATE:**

<u>${variables.effectiveDate}</u> ("Effective Date")

## 1. INTRODUCTION

This Simple Grant Agreement (the "Grant Agreement") is entered into by and between the Grantor and the Recipient (collectively referred to as the "Parties").

The purpose of this Grant Agreement is to identify the roles and responsibilities of each Party.

## 2. SCOPE OF WORK

<u>${variables.scope}</u>
("Scope")

## 3. RESPONSIBILITIES
   - The Recipient will carry out the activities outlined in the Scope.
   - The Grantor may provide reasonable guidance or feedback during the course of the engagement.
   - The Recipient agrees to provide updates or deliverables as mutually agreed and to acknowledge the Grantor's contribution in public-facing communications when relevant.

## 5. PAYMENT TERMS
In consideration of the Recipient's efforts under this Agreement, the Grantor agrees to transfer:
100 Work Tokens (ERC-20)
 Contract address: 0x12be78ca652191616f49420dfa28214bafe9326c
 to the Recipient's Ethereum address listed above.
The token transfer shall occur within 10 business days following the Effective Date, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Parties.
No fiat or additional consideration is provided under this Agreement.

## 6. TERM AND TERMINATION

6.1 This Grant Agreement shall become effective on the Effective Date and shall remain in effect for a period of ${variables.termDuration} unless terminated earlier.

6.2 Either Party may terminate this Grant by providing written notice to the other Party.

6.3 Termination of this Grant shall not affect the completion of any activities already in progress, unless otherwise agreed by the Parties.

## 7. CONFIDENTIALITY

7.1 During the course of this agreement, the Parties may share confidential and proprietary information with each other. Each Party agrees to maintain the confidentiality of all information designated as confidential by the disclosing Party and shall not disclose such information to any third party without the prior written consent of the disclosing Party.

## 8. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY

8.1 This agreement does not transfer any intellectual property rights between the Parties.

8.2 Each Party shall retain all rights, title, and interest in its own intellectual property.

8.3 Any intellectual property created jointly by the Parties during the course of activities under this agreement shall be owned jointly by the Parties, with specific terms to be negotiated in good faith and documented in a separate written agreement.

## 9. SIGNATURES

IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Parties have executed this Simple Grant Agreement as of the Effective Date.

<u>${variables.grantorSignature}</u>
(Grantor Signature)

<u>${variables.recipientSignature}</u>
(Recipient Signature)

By signing, I confirm that I have read, understood, and agree to be legally bound by all terms of this agreement.

AWAITING_TEMPLATE_VARIABLES.name: Awaiting Template Variables
AWAITING_TEMPLATE_VARIABLES.description: Grantor needs to fill out the template variables.

AWAITING_RECIPIENT_SIGNATURE.name: Pending Recipient Signature
AWAITING_RECIPIENT_SIGNATURE.description: This state awaits until Recipient signing the agreement.

AWAITING_GRANTOR_SIGNATURE.name: Pending Grantor Signature
AWAITING_GRANTOR_SIGNATURE.description: This state awaits Grantor's final acceptance of Recipient's data.

AWAITING_WORK_SUBMISSION.name: Awaiting Work Submission
AWAITING_WORK_SUBMISSION.description: The agreement has been accepted by both parties. Awaiting work submission.

WORK_IN_REVIEW.name: Work In Review
WORK_IN_REVIEW.description: The work has been submitted by recipient and is now awaiting grantor review.

AWAITING_PAYMENT.name: Work Accepted, Awaiting Payment
AWAITING_PAYMENT.description: The work has been reviewed and accepted. Awaiting payment from grantor.

WORK_ACCEPTED_AND_PAID.name: Grant Payment Fulfilled
WORK_ACCEPTED_AND_PAID.description: The work has been submitted, reviewed, and payment has been successfully sent.

REJECTED.name: Agreement Rejected
REJECTED.description: The agreement has been rejected by Grantor and will not proceed.
